Html: So, is this project dead or is there any chance of continued support? Like adding support for .NET Standard/Core, updating NuGets.

I have tried to contact the owner of the repo.

Since no reply have made a fork in GitHub and will start pushing to get the owner to take control.

https://github.com/Nico-VanHaaster/Irony.Net
There is already an actively maintained fork on github - https://github.com/daxnet/irony
